name: Neon Tide
description:
The year is 2048. A virus known as "Neon Tide" spreads throughout robots in an unknown fashion. It's your job to unlock the cause of the virus and find a way to stop it.

FEATURES:

  • Neon Tide is a linear story visual novel where you explore a cyberpunk style world as three characters;


Beta (a hologram who wishes he were human)

Lucy (an affected robot who fights for the equality of her race)

Victoria (an affected robot who wants humans and robots to co-exist together)

  • Every choice you make in the game affect the story and each choice comes with a consequence.
  • Multiple endings
  • Full sound effects and music, we recommend playing with headphones.
  • Directed by Will Novy
  • Sound Design and Music by: Daemoneyeddeath

CONTENT WARNING:
This game deals with mature themes. It shows scenes that some may find disturbing, unethical and triggering. It also contains offensive language, sexual themes and violence. Player discretion is advised.
